body_html: I just run the training of this project https://github.com/yjxiong/tsn-pytorch by changing the DataParallel to DistributedDataParallel and used Distributedsampler as a sampler for DataLoader. I think it is because I used a single gpu in rank 0 machine and two gpus in rank 1 machine. when I only used a single gpu in rank 1 machine, this message wont show up.
